Entries.Entry: So, a little while ago I wrote some .NET code that downloaded a given numbered user's profile page on GameDev.net, and parsed the page to get the user name and a little bit of text from one of their posts. Well, I just wrapped it all up into a SOAP Web Service, with a form that you can use to test it out here.

Here it is, my new site. It took a while to get it running again, but hopefully I can keep up with the work load. The site has been completely redesigned, and is now running on a database backend. Hopefully, in the coming weeks I'll be able to develop a number of tools to help manage the site.
78%
